transcript.text:
￼



















































Version 12.0 Release Notes
Designer Studio

7 min
personalize templates with auto translation with the powerful ai driven auto translation feature, your customers can instantly adapt their print content to different languages—like translating from english to spanish within the designer tool in the studio, when any text element is selected, the option for auto translation will appear in the quick actions popup on the selection, the customers can then define the from and to languages, select the text elements that they want to translate and then click on the translate button generate ai powered images in designer studio with our new ai image generation feature, customers can create custom visuals directly within the designer studio in the images tab, the generate section will be available below the image upload block describe what type of image you want, and let ai bring it to life—saving you time and unlocking endless creative possibilities elevate product designs with advance finishes in v12 0, we brought some new effects embossing, debossing, foil, and spot uv—all within the designer studio these premium effects will help the print buyers visualize the live preview of personalized designs the admin can take full advantage of this feature's effects by creating new products altogether with these such as an embossed business card, a raised foil greeting card, a debossed visiting card, and a spot uv business card the advance finishing effects can be enabled from the studio settings once enabled, these effects can be applied in the studio either by selecting the object in the canvas and clicking on the effect from the quick actions popup or to multiple elements via finishes menu from the top panel to reflect the effects in the design, the admin has to assign the gltf 3d model to the product from the real preview section minor enhancements art & logo maker relocated to left panel to offer improved navigation and a user friendly experience, the art layout popup has been relocated from the popup to the left panel when enabled from the admin panel, the customers will be able to access the art layout menu on the studio's left panel real preview assignment redefined while assigning the real preview to any of the products, the admin will now have the flexibility of assigning 2d and 3d real preview models to the product, product size as well as product options with the new enhancement, the admin can choose multiple 2d and 3d models for the preview
Did this page help you?
